item.description:
Game 5 is always a critical game (which one isn't in the finals?). No tellin' what'll happen between now and then. But let's plan to meet for a few beers and watch the big game together. Go Celtics!

Game starts at 8 p.m. EST. We don't have a reservation, so let's just descend upon the sports bar! (I'm working on getting us a reservation, though!)


The beer list is impressive: http://www.championsb...

Hope to see you there!
Alicia

P.S. If you're a Lakers fan, you can still come. But you can only cheer for the Irish. ;-)
item.how_to_find_us: we'll grab a spot in the bar area
item.name: Game 5 NBA Finals
